welcome_message_body: Welcome to the City of Angels! Get ready to experience the charm of Hollywood, the beautiful beaches, and the vibrant culture of Los Angeles. We hope you enjoy exploring all that this amazing city has to offer.

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private aviation.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Van Nuys Airport caters to private and executive aircraft, offering exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport is reserved for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport, serving all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves smaller regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
